title: Strengthening Practical Instructional Competencies: Medication Calculation Skill Enhancement for Nursing Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can solve medication dosage calculation problems required in actual clinical scenarios with 90% accuracy
Learners improve medication calculation self-efficacy by 20% or more through CBVLE (Computer-Based Virtual Learning Environment) task performance
Learners increase intrinsic learning motivation by an average of 1.5 points or more (on a 5-point scale) through weekly task-centered learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
